entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
